Disney Magic at Sea | World Travellers - World Travellers Find your nearest store Destinations Our Deals About Blogs Contact Us SIGN UP Disney Magic at Sea 5 Nights | Auckland roundtrip A Disney Cruise Line holiday is where fun meets relaxation, where escape meets imagination, where dining meets storytelling, where heroes meet destiny, where dreams meet reality, and Where Magic Meets the Sea. Experience Broadway-caliber musicals, reimagined Disney characters, and dazzling new fireworks shows at sea (available on most cruises). Staterooms offer family-friendly features like extra space, ample storage, and a split bath for easy shared use. Savour upscale dining, casual eateries, poolside snacks, and 24-hour room service. Kids can enjoy themed youth clubs staffed by Disney-trained counselors, while adults relax in exclusive bars and lounges. Dive into freshwater pools and thrilling waterslides for endless fun on the high seas. Deal Details Travel Dates 25 Nov 2025 Priced From $2,264 per person Enquire Now Description A Disney Cruise Line holiday is where fun meets relaxation, where escape meets imagination, where dining meets storytelling, where heroes meet destiny, where dreams meet reality, and Where Magic Meets the Sea. Experience Broadway-caliber musicals, reimagined Disney characters, and dazzling new fireworks shows at sea (available on most cruises). Staterooms offer family-friendly features like extra space, ample storage, and a split bath for easy shared use. Savour upscale dining, casual eateries, poolside snacks, and 24-hour room service. Kids can enjoy themed youth clubs staffed by Disney-trained counselors, while adults relax in exclusive bars and lounges. Dive into freshwater pools and thrilling waterslides for endless fun on the high seas. Pricing Deluxe Oceanview Stateroom (Cat 09C) From $2,264* Per person, Family Share Price based on 2 Adults & 2 children ages 5 & 7 yrs Itinerary Day 1 Auckland, New Zealand Day 2 Day at Sea Day 3 Wellington Day 4 Christchurch Day 5 Day at Sea Day 6 Auckland, New Zealand What's Included Entertainment & Activities: Broadway-Quality Shows Fireworks at Sea - available on most itineraries Character Experiences Movie Screenings Pools, Waterslides, Splash Zones & Wading Pools Dining: Breakfast: Table-Service Dining Lunch: Table-Service Dining / Quick Service Bites / 24Hr Room Service Dinner: Table-Service Dining / Quick Service Bites / 24Hr Room Service Snacks: Quick Service Bites / 24Hr Room Service / Soft Serve Ice Cream 24Hr Room Service Unlimited Coffee, Tea and Soda Accommodation & Transportation Spacious Staterooms Extra Storage & Closets Split Bathrooms: A bathroom with a vanity, sink, shower and tub plus a half bathroom with a vanity, sink and toilet (Available in Most Staterooms) Television & In-Room Movies In-Room Amenities: Refrigerator, Safe, Hairdryer, Signature Shower Products Kids Club 3 to 10 years old: Disney's Oceaneer Club & Disney's Oceaneer Lab 11 to 14 years old: Edge 14 to 17 years old: Vibe Adult Exclusive Activities Nightclubs, Lounges & Live Music Adults-Only Pool & Whirlpool Spa Fitness Centre Your Ship Discover a realm of endless enchantment aboard the Disney Wonder . Experience modern comforts and must-see entertainment, all set against the backdrop of opulent art nouveau design inspired by the glamorous cruising era of the early 20th century. Experience dining with a touch of Disney magic, where you can enjoy a wide selection of culinary delights from gourmet dishes to casual snacks. Most dining options are included in your cruise fare, adding an extra sprinkle of enchantment to every meal. Experience dazzling Broadway-style performances where beloved melodies, stunning costumes, and intricate set designs bring Disney stories to life. Enjoy the heartwarming production of Frozen, A Musical Spectacular, the enchanting tale of Disney Dreams – An Enchanted Classic, and the glamorous The Golden Mickeys awards show. Dive into fun at Goofy’s Pool, where you can splash around and soak up the sun. This lively family pool area hosts organised games, energetic on-deck parties, and poolside movies on the 24-foot-wide Funnel Vision screen. Join in on vibrant deck parties featuring your favorite Disney Characters. On most sailings, cap off the night with a breathtaking fireworks display that lights up the sky in a dazzling blend of colour, light, and music. While the kids are busy enjoying their adventures, adults can retreat to exclusive areas and experiences. Enjoy a dedicated pool area, indulge in luxurious spa treatments, savour intimate dining, sample premium beverages, and explore vibrant nightlife options. Indulge in "La Dolce Vita at Sea," where classic Northern Italian cuisine meets contemporary flair in a sophisticated, adult-only setting. Treat yourself to expertly crafted dishes, including dover sole filleted at your table, paired with a superb selection of Italian wines. Unwind and refresh at Senses Spa & Salon, where serene ocean views enhance your relaxation. Indulge in luxurious spa treatments and salon services, and take advantage of the rainforest-inspired showers, aromatherapy steam room, and Roman-style dry sauna before or after your experience. At Disney’s Oceaneer Club, kids can dive into imaginative worlds inspired by Disney storytelling, where their creativity can truly shine. Young Avengers, prepare to step into the secret S.H.I.E.L.D. command center and wield the iconic weapons of your favorite Super Heroes, like Captain America’s shield! Kids ages 3 to 10 can also enjoy arts and crafts, video games, and surprise visits from Super Heroes as they explore their inner hero. In Disney's Oceaneer Club, kids ages 3 to 10 can immerse themselves in a larger-than-life version of Andy's Room from the Toy Story films. They can slide down a giant Slinky Dog slide, dance with Woody at a lively hoedown, or join Jessie on an exciting scavenger hunt. Whether you're organizing a family adventure, a friends' getaway, or a couples' retreat, Disney staterooms and suites offer unparalleled relaxation and comfort. Enjoy modern amenities and unique, magical touches designed to make your stay unforgettable. Terms & Conditions Pricing is correct as of 31 October 2025 and is subject to change and availability at time of booking. *Pricing is based on Best Price fares a deposit & or full payment is due at time of booking. Airfares & transfers are additional. Advertised pricing is a total stateroom price based on 2 adults and 2 children aged 3-12 years sharing. Quad share pricing can vary depending on the ages of guests. Subject to availability & change. Pricing is subject to currency exchange rates at time of payments. Some stateroom category restrictions apply. Fireworks are not guaranteed & dependant on the weather. Itineraries, attractions & entertainment are subject to change. Some staterooms are based on a 'guarantee' stateroom. The exact stateroom grade, number and location on the ship will be allocated at the discretion. Some staterooms have obstructed views. As to Disney artwork, logos & properties: Copyright Disney. Ships' Registry: The Bahamas. Additional taxes/fees payable direct: Gratuities of USD$15-17* per person per night are payable onboard. Gratuities of 18% also apply to onboard purchases. Experience the world differently.
